Description: Body fragment (mended from two sherds) of North Ionian hemispherical bowl; white slip; interior glazed with two added red lines lined in white; outside guilloche pattern, part in red; below, two lines and a glazed lower wall with added white band..
Curator's comments: Perhaps from same bowl as 1924,1201.932, 933 and 934.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.099)
